content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b54f9b35-64f4-4feb-bd0a-a58101f6f682/image2019-10-14_11-30-20.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":771,\"height\":97}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.1. Photography, Videography & Recording\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While the personal devices are not allowed to be used within the MCQ Budapest ODC, also all kinds of photography, videography, recording of both audio and video are banned regardless of used equipment to prevent the deliberate / accidental digitization of MCQ's Sensitive Data / IP leading to potential data loss.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
